ing: 1 (1 ounce) envelope instant hot chocolate mix
des: "A perfect hot toddy for a snowy winter night! Easy to make, delightful to drink, warms you inside-out."
ins: In a large mug, mix the coffee flavored liqueur and peppermint schnapps. Pour in the boiling water, and stir in the hot chocolate mix until well blended. Top with whipped cream and chocolate shavings.
